text: "Be Mine" is a song by French DJ duo Ofenbach. The song has peaked at number five on the French Singles Chart. A remixes EP featuring remixes from Agrume, Antiyu and Stone Van Brooken was released. The song was certified diamond by SNEP. == Music video == The music video featured two men tied to a chair, tortured, abused and controlled by a 'visibly fierce' woman. == Track listing == ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Italy (FIMI) | 7 |- ! scope="row"| Latvia (Latvijas Top 40) | 22 |- ! scope="row"| Mexico (Monitor Latino) | 9 |- ! scope="row"| Mexico Airplay (Billboard) | 2 |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Serbia (Radiomonitor) | 1 |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Slovenia (SloTop50) | 5 |- |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 97 |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| Austria (Ö3 Austria Top 40) | 17 |- ! scope="row"| Belgium (Ultratop Wallonia) | 59 |- ! scope="row"| CIS (Tophit) |style="text- align:center;"| 6 |- ! scope="row"| Germany (Official German Charts) | 26 |- ! scope="row"| Hungary (Dance Top 40) | 88 |- ! scope="row"| Italy (FIMI) | 20 |- ! scope="row"| Poland (ZPAV) | 4 |- ! scope="row"| Russia Airplay (Tophit) |style="text-align:center;"| 4 |- ! scope="row"| Slovenia (SloTop50) | 15 |- ! scope="row"| Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) | 19 |- ! scope="row"| Ukraine Airplay (Tophit) |style="text-align:center;"| 73 |- |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Electronic songs Category:Deep house songs
